_sText:
One day, I decided to make a map where players can take a shield, be a medic to health people or an engineer. These class are available in this map. I use to play at Jail's servers where people use to go to disco or play football. So i put a field where they can play football and voleyball. There is a big disco, an area where Cts can order to go there. 

-Medics can heal other if they are near of people who need their.
-Swats have got a shield.
-Engineers have got a gun with a nice ammo. 

I put some holes where players can stay protected (Pic. 5)

If CTs don't want choose a class there are dispensers of guns or they can just buy the weapons.
